page.title: 10 ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content:
There are quite a few different crafts in the village. Mrs Dougan makes { {pottery }things. She makes pots and models to supply big stores.
Mr Pollard does {woodwork.}He makes things for his daughter's shop in Belper.He makes many different things like eggcups, solitare games, etc. etc.
Mrs Butt does {flower arranging.}She takes classes on Monday afternoons. She and women of her association do the flowers in church every month. She enters shows and has won five or six prizes.
Lastly Mrs Ball is a{florist}.She does arrangements to sell in her shop in Ashbourne. {
